text: @DPJHodges Probably because tories killed 200,000 before #covid19, delayed lockdown till virus was here. Not closed UK borders. Matt Hancock not supplied adaquate #PPE while owning the NHS/Social care supplies company (SCCL-Supply Chain Coordination Ltd). Avoidable deaths,& constant lying.
